column4: Traffic;Kampong Cham: A concrete bridge across the Kien Chrey river has been damaged as high waters receed. The bridge
column7: and in the village of Kien Chrey.------Damage to the bridge was first spotted on 8th October
column8: and on October 21 Kampong Cham authorities requested the National Committee for Disaster Management and related ministries to assist in repairs for both the bridge and damaged riverbanks in the province. ------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA------
